title: Eurovision Song Contest 2015 720p50fps BBC audio + No Commentary
description:
If you agree that we should bring back the orchestra to the Eurovision Song Contest, please sign this petition: http://esclivemusic.com/
This is a song contest, not a karaoke competition!



Basically I re-encoded the original feed (https://thepiratebay.mn/torrent/11958474/Eurovision_Song_Contest__Vienna_2015_(Final)_%5BFEED__HDTV%5D) down from 1080i to 720p and used a bob deinterlacer so the video has a high frame rate (50fps vs 25fps), then I got the BBC audio tracks from the transport stream posted on TPB (https://thepiratebay.mn/torrent/11956212) and synchronized it to the video.

So now there are two tracks for both the BBC audio which contains the commentary by Graham Norton and also the one which contains no commentary, one in stereo and one in DTS 5.1
